property.value: SELECT *,getrolename(sysrole_id) as sysrolename FROM sysrole where is_sysrole!='2654264' and sysrole_id!='instructor' order by ruler_level

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT *,FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(newsDate),'%Y-%m-%d') AS newsDate FROM news ORDER BY newsDate DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT *,FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(activityCreatedate),'%Y-%m-%d') AS activityCreatedate FROM activities where activityArea ='学校' and activitySdate<>activityEdate ORDER BY activityCreatedate DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT *,FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(activityCreatedate),'%Y-%m-%d') AS activityCreatedate FROM activities where activityArea ='学院' and activitySdate<>activityEdate ORDER BY activityCreatedate DESC

property.value: SELECT activityId,activityTitle FROM activities WHERE activityParticipation!="个人" and activityIsDelete='0' and activityClass!='6' and activitySdate<>activityEdate ORDER BY activityCreatedate DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT * ,FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(outAuditDate),'%Y-%m-%d') AS outAuditDates, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(outDate),'%Y-%m-%d') AS outDates FROM gq_check_activity ORDER BY outAuditDates DESC
